reviews.customers_say: Customers find this cashmere sweater exceptional in quality and appreciate its gorgeous color, with one describing it as a beautiful luxurious piece. The sweater receives positive feedback for its softness, thickness, and perfect weight, and customers like its length, particularly noting the great sleeve length. Opinions about sizing are mixed, with some saying it fits true to size while others find it too small.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wow what an amazing, beautiful, and classy item
items.body: Not only does this turtleneck fit true to size ( including arm length), but also it is the perfect weight and length. The description by the seller was completely accurate as was the sizing recommendation. I'll be back for more! Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gorgeous color and quality!
items.body: This sweater is beautiful and so thick and gorgeous! It did t pile much and I wore it all winter!! Love the pretty color and bought 2 crew neck ones in this color from this company too! Will buy this again next fall when they get more in for a dress up sweater. I wear this one ☝️ n our farm daily and it’s such a cheery color and so warm and cozy! Fantastic quality! This color is so pretty and cheery! Read more
items.author: Momk

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful quality and color of this sweater
items.body: Beautiful quality and color of this sweater. I thought it ran a bit small and the neck was tight and hard to get overhead. Read more
items.author: virginia walden

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful luxurious cashmere seeater
items.body: I was so pleased Jen I received this cashmere sweater. The fit is perfect. Th color was just as I expected; and the description seemed softer and thicker than 2 ply! If you’re on the fence about this purchase, don’t be! I give you my word it’ll feel like Christmas when you open the package Read more
items.author: Gloria Jones

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful quality cashmere
items.body: Comfortable sweater made of high quality cashmere. Length of sweater and sleeves is perfect. Weight is substantial but not too thick and turtle neck is high. The color is a great bright blue as seen in the listing photo. Read more
items.author: BostonShopper

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft/ Runs Large
items.body: It is a beautiful sweater! I wish I would have ordered 1 size down. Read more
items.author: River Watcher

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Very nice cashmere. -
items.body: fits well & to size. I would buy again. Read more
items.author: judyann

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great sweater
items.body: The sweater fits my wife well Read more
items.author: Jim

short_description:
Womens Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

long_description:
Womens Dress is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Brown, Mid Grey, Dark Grey, Grey Blue, Black, Green Blue, Beige, Royal Blue, Light Purple, Rose Pink, Grey, Sky Blue, Burgundy, Chocolate. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
